title: Important: Program Schedule Update
content: Please note our updated program schedules during the holiday season. Regular community programs will resume on January 2nd, 2025.

title: New Education Program Launch
content: We're excited to announce the launch of our new adult literacy program with enhanced learning materials and community support.

title: Monthly Development Report December 2024
content: Our December development report is now available featuring program highlights and upcoming community initiatives for 2025.
